Package org.fileprocessor

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FileProcessor
    Basic scaffolding that simply breaks text in lines and invokes @see org.fileprocessor.LineProcessor#process().
    LineProcessor
    Interface to be implemented by classes wanting to process a file and extract some metrics/stats.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultFileProcessor
    Default implementation for files that do not require interactive access to intermediate results of the processing.
    DefaultLineProcessor
    Default Implementation of the @link org.fileprocessor.LineProcessor interface that calculates several simple stats: word count, line count, average number of letters per word (to one decimal place) and most common letter.
    Validation
    Placeholder to store the result of a file read.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Validation.ValidationType
    Indicates if the processing resulted in: a correct result (OK), an error (ERROR), or the process could be done but there are warnings to take a look at (HINT).
